attributes.action: Allow people who voted in the recent EU Referendum to revoke their vote
attributes.background: Many people who have recently voted in the EU referendum regret the way they voted. Many people are saying that they would have voted a different way if that had been given more information.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
